com.topcoder.uml.actions.project
Class ExportDiagramToImageAction

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.uml.actions.project.ExportDiagramToImageAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.Action, com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.TransientAction
public class ExportDiagramToImageAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.TransientAction

ExportDiagramToImageAction class implements TransientAction interface and it will export a diagram to an image file. The diagram should be received as a Component, not as a Diagram. The diagram Component should be the graphical representation of the diagram. It will be passed to the Image Exporter component.

Thread-safety: This class is immutable, and its thread-safety depends on the Image Exporter component.

Version:
1.0
Author:
standlove, TCSDEVELOPER

Field Detail

components

private final java.util.List<java.awt.Component> components

Represents a list of Component objects to export to images in the execute method. Initialized when it is declared to an ArrayList object, and its reference is never changed afterwards. It will never be empty.

viewports

private final java.util.List<java.awt.Rectangle> viewports

Represents a list of Rectangle objects used as viewports in the execute method. Initialized when it is declared to an ArrayList object, and its reference is never changed afterwards. It will be empty if it is not used, if it is used, it must contain the same number of elements as the components list.

location

private final java.lang.String location

Represents the location (path) to store the generated image files in the execute method. Initialized in the constructor, and never changed afterwards. It must be non-null, non-empty string.

fileNames

private final java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileNames

Represents a list of String objects used as the file names of the generated images in the execute method. Initialized to an empty ArrayList object when it is declared, and its reference is never changed afterwards. It will never be empty,and it must contains the same number of elements as the components list.

format

private final java.lang.String format

Represents the format of the images to generate in the execute method. Initialized in the constructor, and never changed afterwards. It must be non-null, non-empty string.

imageExporter

private final com.topcoder.swing.imageexporter.ImageExporter imageExporter

Represents the ImageExporter object used to export diagrams to images in the execute method. Initialized in the constructor and never changed afterwards. It must be non-null.

Constructor Detail

ExportDiagramToImageAction

public ExportDiagramToImageAction(java.awt.Component component,
                                  java.lang.String location,
                                  java.lang.String fileName,
                                  java.lang.String format,
                                  com.topcoder.swing.imageexporter.ImageExporter imageExporter)

Creates the instance with the given component, location, filename, format and the image exporter.

Parameters:
component - the Component object to export as an image.
location - the location (path) to store the generated image files
fileName - the file name of the exported image.
format - the format of the images to generate
imageExporter - the ImageExporter object to export the diagrams.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null, or location, fileName or format is empty string.

ExportDiagramToImageAction

public ExportDiagramToImageAction(java.awt.Component component,
                                  java.awt.Rectangle viewport,

Parameters:
component - the Component object to export as an image.
viewport - the Rectangle object used as the viewport
location - the location (path) to store the generated image files
fileName - the file name of the exported image.
format - the format of the images to generate
imageExporter - the ImageExporter object to export the diagrams.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null, or location, fileName or format is empty string.

ExportDiagramToImageAction

public ExportDiagramToImageAction(java.util.List<java.awt.Component> components,
                                  java.lang.String location,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileNames,
                                  java.lang.String format,
                                  com.topcoder.swing.imageexporter.ImageExporter imageExporter)

Creates the instance with the given list of component, location, list of filenames, format and the image exporter.

Parameters:
components - a list of Component objects to export.
location - the location (path) to store the generated image files
fileNames - a list of file names for the exported image files.
format - the format of the images to generate
imageExporter - the ImageExporter object to export the diagrams.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null, or location or format is empty string, or components or fileNames list is empty or contains null/empty elements, or components and fileNames lists don't contain the same number of elements.

Parameters:
components - a list of Component objects to export.
viewports - a list of Rectangle objects used as viewports.
location - the location (path) to store the generated image files
fileNames - a list of file names for the exported image files.
format - the format of the images to generate
imageExporter - the ImageExporter object to export the diagrams.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null, or location or format is empty string, or components or viewports or fileNames list argument is empty or contains null/empty elements, or components and fileNames and viewports list arguments don't contain the same number of elements.
Method Detail

execute

public void execute()
             throws com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.ActionExecutionException

Exports the diagram to an image file. The diagram will be received as a Component, not as a Diagram. The diagram Component should be the graphical representation of the diagram. It will be passed to the Image Exporter component.

Throws:
com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.ActionExecutionException - if any exception occurs during the execution, it is mainly used to wrap the all possible underlying exceptions.
